div.p: EnteralFormulaAdditiveType: Codes for the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/entformula-additive

description.value: EnteralFormulaAdditiveType: Codes for the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.
